Custom VIP Packages to the 2022 Monaco Grand Prix

It is the most sought-after experience of the Formula 1 season. The glamorous 2022 Monaco Grand Prix is one of the world’s most challenging competitions, not to mention one of the most iconic and prestigious events in all of sport. Roadtrips is proud to offer an extensive selection of race viewing and hospitality possibilities, so our guests can experience this event in true luxury. Your custom-crafted itinerary allows you to choose to watch this prestigious race from a premium grandstand, the exclusive comfort of a circuit-berthed yacht, or an exclusive hospitality venue including the paddocks as well as the Roadtrips Grand Prix Hospitality Lounge.

Our Monaco specialists will combine your preferred viewing option with one of Monaco’s top luxury hotels and set you up with a personal concierge and the services of an experienced on-site host. You tell us what your perfect Monaco Grand Prix experience looks like and we’ll design a personalized itinerary just for you. Complete 2022 Monaco Grand Prix luxury travel packages are available from $6,695 (premium grandstand seating) or $9,740 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Monaco Grand Prix

The Monaco Grand Prix will take place May 29, 2022 on the Circuit de Monaco. As one of the world’s most recognized destinations and iconic sporting events, the Monaco Grand Prix is a true bucket list experience for any traveler. This prestigious race has been running since 1929 on the very same track, through the very same streets. Being that it’s considered the royalty of auto racing, it is fitting that there be royalty at the event. In its history, the Monaco Grand Prix has been overseen by three generations of Monaco’s royal family. The Monaco circuit is praised for the glamour and the prestige, and never seems to disappoint. From Monaco’s nobility to the entertainment world’s A-listers, this is an event of big names and bigger action.
